short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Project Nuance measures the polarization level of your selected text with a simple right-click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our metric gauges the polarization level of social media comments with the aim of fostering civil discourse in our increasingly divided world. 

Rate an online comment by either right-clicking and then selecting the extension option, or paste it into the extension itself.
